text: Winslow hides under my bed and scares my enemies.
He eats the bad guys when I sleep.
Do you eat bad guys, mister?
My mom says I'm like Nemo.
Because I get lost a lot.
Where are we? I got lost on my way home...
I followed the roads but I couldn't leave.
My mom says to follow the roads so I don't get lost.
But I think I got lost again.
I followed the road but I just came back here.
Do you know where to go?
Mom also says to ask an adult for help if I get lost.
Really? But you don't know stuff.
You don't know very much, do you, mister?
Winslow wanted me to tell you that...
... you're really fluffy, but not as fluffy as Winslow.
But I told him I can prove him wrong!
I just need to touch your ears.
But the other adult let me touch his ears.
Yeah. You remind me of him.
He was helping me get home because I was lost.
But... I wonder where he went?
Mom said to stay in one place if I get lost.
She said to wait for her to come get me.
So I'll stay with you, okay?
options: That's a smart thing to do.

text: If you go on your boat and go really really far...
... will you crash into the mountains?
You can't go to the mountains? What if you try really hard?
I want to see if there's snow.
Mr. Big Hat might be there. He got lost in the snow.
He said he would help me go home.
But he's a dum-dum. He got lost, too.
He let me touch them. They're warm.
Uh-huh. He helped me so I want to help him.
So I gotta go to the mountains. What if he's there?
You think so? Should I wait?
options: The boat never seems to move.
You want to go to the mountains?
Mr. Big Hat sounds like a good friend.
What if he's looking for you too?
If I figure out how to get there...

text: Can I go in your pouch?
But I go in mom's pouch when it's cold.
Mr. Big Hat also doesn't have a pouch.
What do you do if you're cold?
Woa! So does Mr. Big Hat!
But! But! If you sleep the whole time, you won't see the snowflakes!
Did you know that every snowflake is different?
Yep! Mom says they're frozen stars.
They fall from the sky, and you make wishes on them.
I wish to touch your ears.
options: Yes, it's been a bit chilly.
I don't have one of those.

text: I think... I think it was colder when I got lost.
There was snow everywhere. I couldn't see the road.
Mr. Big Hat showed up and let me hold his hand.
He said he was gonna go look for food.
Mr. Big Hat says he sleeps when it's too cold so I went to sleep, too.
When I woke up, I was here, but not Mr. Big Hat.
Do you think he's still looking for me?
options: Is it? It feels the same.

text: The road! The road that leads home.
So... I came to say bye.
If you see Mr. Big Hat, tell him I went home, okay?
He'll protect you. He'll eat the bad guys.
He likes warm places. So don't let him get cold, okay?
He gives you a big hug.
Thank you for waiting with me, mister.
